parameters: <CC Face: 1>I think I'll hold off on the bra for now, thanks though.

Well, if you ever change your mind, it'll be here waiting for you. Oh, and if you wanted a different color, a lot of the clothes here are made with these new magic thread thingies, they let you change the color of your clothes whenever, which is nice.
You head back into the changing room and take the bra off, before replacing your \V[66] and heading out. You immediately feel your nipples rub against your shirt, and curse softly to yourself.
You decide to take off the clothes you had been trying and stick with your original skirt, and immediately feel dirty for it.

You sure you want to stick with the microskirt? Oh, I get it, you were just being coy before, weren't you? Naughty girl, if you want to keep teasing the boys around town with those legs, don't let me get in your way.

You blush at her remarks. You're not a tease, you're just poor, that's all. That's what you keep telling yourself, anyways. The tingling sensation in your chest has nothing to do with walking around town like this, that's for sure.
Ask about the color changing again
Ask about the cursed clothing she's selling
Offer to model clothes for Claire
Ask about the color changing again
Ask about the cursed clothing she's selling
Offer to model clothes for Claire
Offer to model a third time
You get the feeling Claire is about to make you model for her again...
Offer to model a third time
So, what's it gonna be? Flash, or cash?
\c[14]You've purchased a trench coat for 40 silver! What a ripoff!
You get the feeling Claire is about to make you model for her again...

Oh, hey, um, thanks for modelling those outfits for me the other day. Just wanted to let you know, if you’d like to buy any of those as well, you’ll have to talk to me. I can’t have such important and valuable items out for just anyone to buy them, obviously.
The return trip through the alleyways goes much smoother, and you quickly return to the town square without incident.
You quickly change into your trench coat and choker before exiting, but without providing Claire a show. That's what she gets for ripping you off.
The return trip through the alleyways goes much smoother, and you quickly return to the town square without incident.
The return trip through the alleyways goes much smoother, and you quickly return to the town square without incident.
Skirts it is then. I think you'll like these, they're still pretty cute, but also give you the ability to bend over without showing everyone what you've got under your skirt.

She leads you over to the skirt section, and when she picks one out and holds it up to you, you have to agree it is still a huge improvement over what you've got now. Claire corrals you into the changing room with the skirt, and you try it on.

It definitely looks a lot better, in terms of not exposing every inch of your legs. It comes down just past your knees, a perfectly modest skirt length that you see all the time around town. You'd probably be ok with wearing this, and it's a hell of a lot cheaper to boot.

Knowing Claire is going to want you to model the skirt, you strut out and give another playful twirl, causing the skirt to fan out to the sides, but still covering more than your previous skirt did. The feeling of the breeze against your legs is still a little exciting, and no matter how long a skirt is, a powerful enough breeze \ficould\fi flip it up, but overall, you'd be a lot happier wearing this.

You look like your having fun, now that you can move without flashing me. If you want to go with the skirt, you can try on some other colors, though you can just change the color of yours after you buy it.
You could also take another look at the pants, if you’ve got the coin for them. Sticking to Beatrice’s tiny skirt is also an option, if a rather lewd one.

There is a selection of knee-length skirts here. They are all basic solid color skirts, made with a light material suited for the temperate climate around Elmgar. Wearing a skirt is obviously a bit girly, but these are probably the least girly of them, and they are cheap, costing only five silver. They also have the magical material Claire mentioned, so you can swap between colors at will after you buy one.
There are a variety of different skirts here. If any catch your eye, you can try them on to get a better idea of how they look.
Try on a pair of basic panties
Try on a pair of elegant panties
Try on a pair of basic panties
Try on a pair of elegant panties

You head on over to the underwear section and start looking around. You can't help but get a thrill out of looking at all of these, it just feels so \finaughty,\fi even if nobody else sees anything out of place.
First on the list, is just a solid color "bikini" style pair of panties. Much like the pair you got from Beatrice, but more basic and with a variety of colors.

If you want something a bit more exciting, there is a pair of lacy panties as well. The lace has a design that you can only describe as... fancy? You'd never thought panties could be anything but sexy before, but these come off as somewhat elegant. Elegant and sexy, that is. There's even a matching bra, though you could purchase them separately if you wished.
Lastly, there is an... interesting pair of panties. They're only available in purple, and have a pouch in the front, meant to accommodate something, perhaps? They are also completely backless.

The legwear is right with the underwear here. There are two options for sale at the moment. The first is standard pantyhose, made of a sheer material and clinging tightly to your legs, it's available in black or white. The other option is listed as... "programmer socks"? What is a programmer supposed to be? And why do they have special socks? You aren't sure, but you have the suspicion asking Claire wouldn't be worth the time, so you're going to ignore that part. They are thigh-high socks with a striped pattern. The two colors are pink on white, and light blue on white. The programmer socks are quite expensive, but somehow, looking at them, you know they'll provide a \fisignificant\fi boost to femininity. Additionally, they are both buy and get one free, so you'll have both colors if you buy either pair.

There is a selection of short-sleeved blouses here. They are basic one color shirts, with a bit of lacy trim around the collar. Wearing girls clothing is going to make you feel girly, of course, but these aren't going to be too uncomfortable to wear, as they are very modest, fully covering your chest. The sign on the rack says they are five silver each.

There is a selection of skin-tight pants here. They are made with girls in mind, so you can find a size to fit you even if you've got a giant butt, but they aren't very girly in design, other than how the skin-tight material draws attention to your booty.
The rack displays all the colors you can make these pants, and you can change the color whenever you want after you buy a pair, if you've got twenty silver to spare.

Bras. Bras everywhere. Push-up bras, sports bras, bras that don't even cover your breasts, and a bunch of other kinds of bras you don't know the names of. In dozens of styles, each in a variety of colors.

The first thing that catches your attention is a basic padded bra, which seems to be a good starting point. The padding is more for comfort than anything, so it would make your boobs look much bigger. There's plenty of colors to choose from, if you'd like to try one on.

Looking around a bit, you also find a fancier bra. The lace and designs makes it come off as a bit more... mature? Elegant, even. The padded bra is fine and all, but it's also the sort of thing a girl would get as her first bra. This is stepping it up a notch, the kind of bra you wear hoping someone else ends up seeing it.

There's a bin filled with all sorts of items here, which would interest you if the bin itself wasn’t labelled “cursed items.” You aren’t going to mess around with those without asking Claire about them first, that’s for sure.
Try on the two-inch black heels
Examine or buy the Holstaur Bikini
Try on the two-inch black heels
Examine or buy the Holstaur Bikini
This section is full of items meant to be worn in a set. The armoured set goes together, and then the three other items are a separate set.
Look at that dress for Katie
Look at that dress for Katie
Buy the dress for Katie for twenty silver?
One of Claire's changing rooms. Luckily, your "Clothes Beam" let's you instantly change into whatever outfit you wish.
One of Claire's changing rooms. Luckily, your "Clothes Beam" let's you instantly change into whatever outfit you wish.
One of Claire's changing rooms. Luckily, your "Clothes Beam" let's you instantly change into whatever outfit you wish.
\C[25]\fiPick an outfit to receive from Claire's first modeling scene.

\c[25]\fiThese items are from events that branch off into different paths, with different results resulting in you getting different items. The first example that unlocks this is the dungeon encounter with Alexandra. You either get her servants clothing, or you steal an outfit from her, but you can’t get both, so you can buy them here instead. Anytime you have to choose between clothes, the other option should end up here.
\c[24]Does\..\..\.. Does \finobody\fi care that there's a glowing red portal in the middle of the clothing shop?
<CC Face: 1>\c[4]Oh, that's just the event shop.
\c[24]What does that mean? Event shop? What event? Please elaborate.
\c[24]Who is Alexandra\..\..\.. And why would I want her dress?
<CC Face: 1>\c[4]You'd look pretty cute in it.
<CC Face: 1,8>T-Tillanie? What are you doing here?
This carpet is really comfortable, and there's so much space in here\..\..\..
